description.value: Through strength and skill, you forcibly maneuver your opponent. Make an Athletics test against the Physical defense of a character within your reach. On a success, you push or pull the target 5 feet horizontally. If you successfully Shove a character who has grappled you, it ends the@UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.EVPgpHL6Y4jrumwI]{ Grapple }effect.
